thread.title: BRIEF-Bausch + Lomb Says FDA Approved Ultra Family Of Contact Lenses For Extended Wear

title: BRIEF-Bausch + Lomb Says FDA Approved Ultra Family Of Contact Lenses For Extended Wear

organizations.name: contact lenses for extended wear reuters staff

text:
May 2, 2018 / 12:45 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago BRIEF-Bausch + Lomb Says FDA Approved Ultra Family Of Contact Lenses For Extended Wear Reuters Staff
May 2 (Reuters) - Valeant Pharmaceuticals International Inc :
* BAUSCH + LOMB ULTRAÂ® CONTACT LENSES RECEIVE FDA APPROVAL FOR EXTENDED WEAR INDICATION
* BAUSCH + LOMB SAYS U.S. FDA APPROVED BAUSCH + LOMB ULTRA FAMILY OF CONTACT LENSES FOR EXTENDED WEAR OF UP TO 6 NIGHTS & 7 DAYS OF CONTINUOUS WEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
